item.description:
What's your Affirmations for 2012?

Do you feel good, exuberant and uplifted.... when you say your affirmations?

or Are you faking it?...trying to remain affirming when inside, you're in "dis-belief"
because your reality clearly shows it's not true.

We’ll listen & watch (via audio/video) what master teachers/coaches have to share, & do experiential exercises

- to understand why invoking " I AM " in your affirmations is so powerfully (& why it's important to use it when you mean it & not fake it)

- to become aligned with your affirmations (even when your reality is so "not" affirming)

- to make your heart "sing" with affirmations that are inspiring and true to you (& no more faking it) 

Kick off the New Year with Affirmations

.... the empowering way.

 

******************************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

******************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

(1) Go here:  http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in

(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Ho to Create Empowering Affirmations. No more faking it.
